content: DETROIT  Nov 2 U.S. truck leasing and rental company Ryder Systems Inc said on Thursday it will order 125 all-electric delivery vans from Chanje  one of the first big purchases made in the still nascent electric truck industry.
name: Ryder System Inc
title: U.S. rental truck firm Ryder makes first big electric van order

content: * Ryder acquires Dallas Service Center Inc to expand fleet maintenance network and add new body repair capabilities Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
name: Ryder System Inc
title: BRIEF-Ryder acquires Dallas Service Center to expand fleet maintenance network

content: Aug 14 U.S. truck leasing and rental company Ryder Systems Inc said on Monday it would become the exclusive sales partner for California-based electric truck maker Chanje  which would roll out its first commercial vehicle in the last quarter of 2017.
name: Ryder System Inc
title: Ryder to offer Chanje's electric trucks on lease

content: * Ryder partners with Chanje Energy to become exclusive sales channel partner and service provider
name: Ryder System Inc
title: BRIEF-Ryder System partners Chanje Energy to become exclusive sales channel partner and service provider

content: * Q2 non-GAAP earnings per share $1.00 from continuing operations

title: BRIEF-Ryder sees Q3 2017 GAAP earnings per share $1.15 to $1.25

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  October 11 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Long- and Short-Term  Issuer Default Ratings (IDRs) of Ryder System  Inc. (Ryder) at 'A-'/ 'F2'   following the completion of its fleet leasing peer review. The Rating Outlook is  Stable. A full list of rating actions follows at the end of this release. KEY RATING DRIVERS  IDRS AND SENIOR DEBT The ratings are supported by Ryder's established market position in the truck  leasing
name: Ryder System Inc
title: Fitch Affirms Ryder System's Ratings at 'A-'/'F2' Following Peer Review; Outlook Stable

content: May 25 Ryder System Inc's shares could rise 30 percent in a year as the truck rental company continues to attract first-time leases and expands its out-sourced maintenance services  Barron's financial newspaper said in its latest issue.
name: Ryder System Inc
title: Ryder shares could rise 30 percent in a year - Barron's
